mapper.select:
select ID, LINE_CODE, LINE_NAME, VOLT_TYPE, LINE_TYPE, P_ID, RUN_DATE, SWITCH_NO, STATION_ID, E_STATION_ID, LINE_MODEL, LINE_LENGHT, RATING_CURNT, RATING_VOL, CREATE_DATE, REMARK, STATUS, BUSINESS_PLACE_CODE, VOLT_CODE, ADDRESS, GUID, WEIGHT, RUN_STATUS_CODE, CREATOR_ID, LAST_MODIFIER_ID, LAST_MODIFIER_TIME from LINE_INFO
and ID = #{id}

select ID, LINE_CODE, LINE_NAME, VOLT_TYPE, LINE_TYPE, P_ID, RUN_DATE, SWITCH_NO, STATION_ID, E_STATION_ID, LINE_MODEL, LINE_LENGHT, RATING_CURNT, RATING_VOL, CREATE_DATE, REMARK, STATUS, BUSINESS_PLACE_CODE, VOLT_CODE, ADDRESS, GUID, WEIGHT, RUN_STATUS_CODE, CREATOR_ID, LAST_MODIFIER_ID, LAST_MODIFIER_TIME from LINE_INFO
and LINE_CODE = #{lineCode}
mapper.insert:
insert into LINE_INFO ( LINE_CODE, LINE_NAME, VOLT_TYPE, LINE_TYPE, RUN_DATE, SWITCH_NO, LINE_MODEL, LINE_LENGHT, RATING_CURNT, RATING_VOL, CREATE_DATE, REMARK, STATUS, BUSINESS_PLACE_CODE, P_ID, STATION_ID, E_STATION_ID, VOLT_CODE, ADDRESS, GUID, WEIGHT, RUN_STATUS_CODE, CREATOR_ID, LAST_MODIFIER_ID, LAST_MODIFIER_TIME ) values ( #{lineCode}, #{lineName}, #{voltType}, #{lineType}, #{runDate}, #{switchNo}, #{lineModel}, #{lineLenght}, #{ratingCurnt}, #{ratingVol}, #{createDate}, #{remark}, #{status}, #{businessPlaceCode},
#{pId}, #{stationId}, #{eStationId}, #{voltCode}, #{address}, #{guid}, #{weight}, #{runStatusCode}, #{creatorId}, #{lastModifierId}, #{lastModifierTime} )
mapper.update:
update LINE_INFO
LINE_CODE = #{lineCode},
LINE_NAME = #{lineName},
VOLT_TYPE = #{voltType},
LINE_TYPE = #{lineType},
RUN_DATE = #{runDate},
SWITCH_NO = #{switchNo},
LINE_MODEL = #{lineModel},
LINE_LENGHT = #{lineLenght},
RATING_CURNT = #{ratingCurnt},
RATING_VOL = #{ratingVol},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate},
REMARK = #{remark},
STATUS = #{status},
BUSINESS_PLACE_CODE = #{businessPlaceCode},
P_ID = #{pId},
STATION_ID = #{stationId},
E_STATION_ID = #{eStationId},
VOLT_CODE = #{voltCode},
ADDRESS = #{address},
GUID = #{guid},
WEIGHT = #{weight},
RUN_STATUS_CODE = #{runStatusCode},
CREATOR_ID = #{creatorId},
LAST_MODIFIER_ID = #{lastModifierId},
LAST_MODIFIER_TIME = #{lastModifierTime},
and ID = #{id}
